sik.common
Class Store

java.lang.Object
  sik.common.Store
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class which contains student record objects and methods to work with and handle those objects. This class also provides methods to export and import student record store object to and from a file

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University *
See Also:

currentRecord

public StudentRecord currentRecord()
Returns the record corresponding the the currentAccountIndex which are navigated through by the first record pointer, last record pointer, previous record pointer and next record pointer methods

Returns:
returns the current record

Points to first record which is that of the first object in the array

lastRecordPointer

public void lastRecordPointer()
points to the last record which is that of the size of the array -1

Points to the next record pointer, which increments the currentAccountIndex
